metadata.synopsis: Orthon has promised support in the fights to come and is trying to encourage the player to get on with it and begin the assault.

0.speaker: Yurgir
0.text: Smells like violence all around... smoke, blood, tears... this will be a good hunt. Hurry on and start the attack.
0.context: NodeContext: Savouring the moment. Keen to make some havoc

1.speaker: Yurgir
1.text: I'm here for killing, not talking. Begin the attack.
